flawed_nl_solution:
The bus journey takes 15 + 25 = <<15+25=38>>38 minutes.
The walk from the bus stop to his house will take Harry 38 / 2 = <<38/2=19>>19 minutes.
So he will have been traveling for 38 + 19 = <<38+19=57>>57 minutes.
#### 57

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 38. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
